sources.title: Revenge Seeking Killer | Anatomy of a Psycho (1961) Colorized | Crime, Thriller | Subtitles
sources.description:
On the night of his brother's execution for a stick-up murder, a man snaps and decides to get even with everyone responsible for the conviction.

Original title: Anatomy of a Psycho (1961)

B&W version: https://youtu.be/jb-_n_N7M7A

Director: Boris Petroff 
Writers: Jane Mann, Don Devlin, Edward D. Wood Jr.
Actors: Ronnie Burns, Pamela Lincoln, Darrell Howe 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Crime, Drama, Psychotronic, Thriller
